Sound is too low.

I have everything maxed out and it's only good enough to watch while sitting at the desk.

Due to this, Windows alerts are very loud and become annoying.

@robrub,
Sir if you are using Windows 7, you can lower the volume of Windows system alerts while the general volume is at the top.

To do this, click on the speaker icon on the notification icons area. Click on the "Mixer". Lower the "System Sounds". Here you are.

BTW, Thanks mkvGOD!

Great upload! Great quality! I have problems finding the right subtitles. Until now nothing goes sync.(English, French & Dutch)accept for the first season...

Does anybody have the right ones(Season 2 & 3) in En,Fre & Du?
Thanks..

@ Athenatius: You can modify subtitle files to sync. I use something called Subtitle Editor, don't have dl link sorry, but it is free. The task of finding subtitles (other than english) that fit the exact version you have can be a real chore without a program like this. It enables you to change the timing of subtitles down to the millisecond, and it's easy to use.

@ Esmad3:

Thanks for your reaction! Yes I'm aware of such programs but I was hoping to find the ones already in sync. Until now I was pretty lucky finding them. So now I'm gonna follow your advice.

I cannot succeed with Subtitle Editor/Workshop.
So if there's anybody who has synced subs of Season 2&3 in Dutch & French, I would be very happy.
I did find all the English subs..

Thanks..

Great upload altogether.

Just finished downloading.. I got the VLC media player, but all the shows are just grey blobs aside from the occasional picture.. audios fine. anyone know what im doing wrong?

Yay, more overly-compressed poor quality MKVs of a great TV show from "mkvgod", lord be praised!

Seriously though, the whole point of getting shows in HD is higher quality right?  These types of tiny rip end up looking worse than the regular 350MB SD scene rips upscaled.  There's a reason proper 40 minute TV show rips are around 1GB... higher bitrate and less quantisation means noticably excellent quality.

(Side note: I downloaded the Dollhouse rips mkvGOD did and they were pisspoor.)
